subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Spine (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Determined to continue in show jumping competitions, Georgina Bloomberg, daughter of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York City, has come back from multiple injuries and spinal surgery.
snippet: Determined to continue in show jumping competitions, Georgina Bloomberg, daughter of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York City, has come back from multiple injuries and spinal surgery.
